ygData.subject: Re: Paladins
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a level 46 wizzy and I don t sit patiently around until the mob is half dead before I do anything. There are several things I can do that don t argo the
ygData.messageBody:
I play a level 46 wizzy and I don't sit patiently
around until the mob is half dead before I do anything.
There are several things I can do that don't argo the
mob too much, I can stun them (doesn't work very well
on giants) with Titans Clash, I can snare (if there
is no snarer in the group), I can root a mob and if
all else fails, I can hit it with minor nukes say dmg
187 compared to my big nuke of 614.<br><br>Oh well
just a wizzy's imput.<br><br>Wizzkid<br>Order of Grim
Realm Warriors<br>Xegony Server
